text: Bachia bicolor, the two-colored bachia, is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is found in Venezuela and Colombia. ==References== Category:Bachia Category:Reptiles described in 1896 Category:Reptiles of Peru Category:Endemic fauna of Peru Category:Taxa named by Charles Earle Burt Category:Taxa named by May Danheim Burt
title: Bachia bicolor
